item.title: Found what might be base to real special bar
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

while going through xeros cheezscape80 source i found this:

public void frame70(int i1, int i2, int i3) // interface thing, not sure
{
outStream.createFrame(70); // THIS FRAME IS FOR SPECIAL ATTACK BAR MOFOS!
outStream.writeWord(i1); // offset X
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i2); // offset Y
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i3); // interface, definatly.
sendMessage("Frame 70 tested");
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

so idk if this helped anyone or not but this is what i found[br][size=1]Posted at: September 30, 2006, 08:06:30 AM[/size][hr]and could someone tell me how the frame commands for like f70… when ever i try stuff like ::f70 4 4 4 dont work but i dont get frames lol

Read full topic
item.source: Found what might be base to real special bar
